casebody.data:
In the Matter of DISCIPLINE OF Jeffrey Adam WERTKIN. No. D-3014. Supreme Court of the United States April 2, 2018.

Jeffrey Adam Wertkin, of Washington, District of Columbia, is suspended from *1458the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
